content: IF U WANT TO SPOIL UR MOOD THEN U CAN ORDER IN THIS APP.. WORST SERVICE

this is not the first time... there is no proper response from the customer care and not responding on time and I think you guys are just enjoying it by delaying the orders and not delivering on time, just getting irritated by this type of thing, have to wait for food 30 mins and it will delay another 30 mins and customer care will delay other 20 mins for providing the reason or response... waste of money and time l, we don't have freedom as well to cancel the order even if it's getting delayed

I had a very bad delivery experience. The delivery person went in the wrong direction and wasn‚Äôt attending my calls. Even after contacting customer service, nothing improved, and I had to cancel the order after waiting nearly two hours. This is not the first time, issues like this keep happening because the rules and monitoring are too weak. Because of this recurring issues I will not be using this platform again.
very disappointed regarding the service order not delivered on time instead of Swiggy go to the restaurant and order fresh meal.

Recently Swiggy offered no delivery charges no handling charges etc. But be aware and check every time what you ordered and what you received. Recently I received one packet of Sugar 1 kg short in supply and on complaint to them instead of refund or supply 1 more packet they sent me a message that we will assure you this will not happen in future.

Worst app. Delivery timing showing 10min,5min,3mins,etc. But actual delivery NEVER. If you can't deliver order please admit it and do not take order. I ordered at 5PM.But even after 5 days it says order out for delivery .I didn't get any refund.My Money wasted . Its a complete fraud app.

today I ordered food from Swiggy at 8:18pm , delivery time shown 35 minutes but food is not delivered yet 9:45pm when I call delivery partner, he said I have lost my bag I am searching for it , but not informed my senior about it that I couldn't deliver food , then I talk to customer care executive she apologized and behalf of this kind act she cancelled my order and give me extra refund of 31 rupees so I can purchased a hotel for next dinner üò°üò°üò°üò°üò°üò°

food i got was pale and can't be eaten than no one talked automatically they issued refund of 18 rupees and closed the order my order was 119 rupees and I have to throw that away and they gave me 18 rupees like stupidity I don't know what to say anymore same thing happened again today also the delivery was delayed by 25 mins the order was ready and no delivery partner was not there i complained about it thst I hsve received cold food and again 18 rupees cash back

The scammer of the day goes to Swiggy, they are showing an option for express delivery, taking our money also and not providing the same service for which they charged us, and then they have the audacity to say this particular order cannot be delivered under express delivery. No refund, no apologies nothing, and they make it way harder to report this issue. They did it again, they don't value our time.

Order not delivered for 2 hours and delivery agent didn‚Äôt answer calls. Support cancelled the order and claimed refund was initiated, but even after 2 days nothing was credited. My bank confirmed the RRN Swiggy gave doesn‚Äôt exist. Support kept looping me between agents with no solution, some even hung up. All they say is ‚Äúkeep waiting.‚Äù Worst support experience.
This app does not deliver food in my area bad app

I have been a swiggy one member since years, but now the app is gone worst. The orders are always delayed. The customer support executives are not helpful and disconnect the call. I had placed an order from a restaurant near my place, there was no delivery partner asigned for more than 40 mins. When i told them to cancel the order the swiggy executive said he cant cancel the order as the delivery partner has been assigned who was 10 kms away from restaurant while the restaurant was not even 1 km
No no, in my view your image has been ruined and cannot be restored again.

I never wanted to give any rating below 4 to swiggy but, when I order stuff like milk or milk products on instamart, why do they always ALWAYS bring expired products. even the pictures won't have the correct dates on the app. and the products they bring us are expired. If I didn't check and use them and I get food poisoning, will you pay for my bills? how much time does it even take for you to check the expiry date???

I ordered food from a restaurant which was 2km away but Swiggy without informing me placed the order to a restaurant next to my house which is unhygienic and does not cook well. when I tried to cancel the order it asked me 100% cancellation fee even when it's a mistake by the app itself. looks like a scam to me. coz this restaurant has cheaper price but Swiggy charged me for restaurant which is expensive......

Swiggy app par biryani ka asli market price ‚Çπ50‚Äì‚Çπ60 (250gm) hota hai, lekin app par MRP ‚Çπ230 dikhakar sirf fake 70% off show kiya ja raha hai. Checkout par extra GST ‚Çπ36 aur delivery charges add karke misleading pricing ki ja rahi hai. Customer ko galat offer dikha kar full paisa liya ja raha hai. Yeh unfair trade practice hai.
